verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: spend] [ARG3: hundreds of dollars] [ARG1: to run the nyc marathon every year] — here why it worth the price last year i spent 522 to run 26 2 miles through all five boroughs of new york city for the marathon and it was worth every penny cnbc the new york times new york city ron lieber tcs nyc marathon
